title: My name is Daniel Almeida and I'm a Frontend Developer

cards.title: technology
cards.text: Technology guided my educational path. The possibilities of the emerging digital processes motivated my research as an Architect and made me pursuit an education and career in Software Engineering.

cards.title: design
cards.text: As a former Architect I love to build beautiful things. Frontend Development gives me the opportunity to gather two of my favourite things: technology and design.

cards.title: animals
cards.text: I love my cats and I love my dogs. They are part of my family and help me handle the natural stress that comes with the role of a Software Developer.

cards.description: Frontend development in an Agile international team, using the power of RxJS and Angular to deliver a great product.
Full-Stack Development for a foreign government institution software.
Post-Graduation in Software Engineering in a full Agile environment.
Idealization and execution of Architecture projects during all its phases: licensing, development and detailing.
Idealization and execution of temporary pavilions.
The Digital Fabrication Laboratory (DFL) is the research group of the CEAU/FAUP committed with developing advanced research work in the fields of Design,
